room_title: Escape room "Patient 37" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: Awesome experience. We did the patient 37 room and what a theme. This was well worth the drive and to top it off we are the new record holders with an escape of 37ish minutes. Thanks for having us!

room_title: Escape room "Patient 37" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: Did Patient 37 room. Was super fun and definitely a fun challenge. First time doing an escape room and I can't wait to do another one. The girls at the front desk were super friendly and helpful. Will definitely be back!
